"This explains the Dark Blast PA, Punishment Knuckle.

Punishment Knuckle is a PA that builds up power for a full-body punch.

By charging the PA, you can increase its power massively, to the point of being able to destroy \"Devil Walls\" with a single punch in Buster Quests."
